pages.title: Computer Port
pages.text: The Computer Port allows you to connect your Energizer to a computer, enabling you to gather information on the status of the Energizer.$(br2)A standard set of methods is exposed to the connected computer, and you can use them to query the status of the Energizer.

pages.usage.text: $(l)Mandatory:$() no$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no
